anathema: allow evil to spread, destroy that which brings joy to others, fail to offer evil a chance to surrender

markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[The Prismatic Ray](/Deities.aspx?ID=207)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Friends in High Places](/Sources.aspx?ID=30) pg. 1

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** Create works that inspire good acts, defend those who cannot defend themselves, pursue evil

**Anathema** allow evil to spread, destroy that which brings joy to others, fail to offer evil a chance to surrender

**Area of Concern**
Defeating evil, guarding innocents, and wholesome creations

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

**Pantheon Members**
[Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

</column>
name: The Prismatic Ray
